boons.name: Heaven's Vengeance
boons.description: After you take damage, your foe is struck by lightning.

boons.name: Lightning Reflexes
boons.description: After you Dash just before getting hit, a bolt strikes a nearby foes.

boons.name: Storm Lightning
boons.description: Your chain-lightning effects bounce more times before expiring.

boons.name: High Voltage
boons.description: Your lightning bolt effects deal damage in a larger area.

boons.name: Double Strike
boons.description: Your lightning bolt effects have a chance to strike twice.

boons.name: Static Discharge
boons.description: Your lightning effects also make foes Jolted.

boons.name: Clouded Judgment
boons.description: Your God Gauge charges faster when you deal or take damage.

boons.name: Billowing Strength
boons.description: After using Call, you deal more damage for 15 Sec.

boons.name: Splitting Bolt
boons.description: All your lightning effects create an additional burst.

boons.name: Dying Lament
boons.description: When foes are slain, they damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

boons.name: Wave of Despair
boons.description: After you take damage, damage nearby foes and inflict Weak.

boons.name: Different League
boons.description: Resist some damage from nearby foes' attacks.

boons.name: Life Affirmation
boons.description: Any Health chamber rewards are worth more.

boons.name: Empty Inside
boons.description: Your Weak effects have a longer duration.

boons.name: Sweet Surrender
boons.description: Weak-afflicted foes are also more susceptible to damage.

boons.name: Broken Resolve
boons.description: Your Weak effects are more potent.

boons.name: Blown Kiss
boons.description: Your Cast shoots farther and is stronger against undamaged foes.

boons.name: Unhealthy Fixation
boons.description: Your Weak effects also have a 15% chance to Charm foes.

boons.name: Typhoon's Fury
boons.description: You deal more damage when slamming foes into barriers.

boons.name: Hydraulic Might
boons.description: Your Attack and Special are stronger the first 10 Sec. in Encounter(s).

boons.name: Ocean's Bounty
boons.description: Any Gemstone, Darkness or Obols chamber rewards are worth more.

boons.name: Sunken Treasure
boons.description: Gain an assortment of Gemstone, Darkness, Obols and Health.
